title: Rhys Mathewson
text:
Rhys Mathewson (born 20 June 1988) is a professional <a href="Australia">Australia</a>n <a href="darts">darts</a> player who plays in <a href="World%20Darts%20Federation">World Darts Federation</a> and <a href="Professional%20Darts%20Corporation">Professional Darts Corporation</a> events.
He made his television debut in the <a href="2016%20Sydney%20Darts%20Masters">2016 Sydney Darts Masters</a>, where he caused a shock by beating <a href="James%20Wade">James Wade</a> in a last-leg decider, before losing to <a href="Peter%20Wright%20%28darts%20player%29">Peter Wright</a> in the quarter-finals.
Earlier that year, he won the Russell Stewart Classic, and in 2017, he won two DPA Australian Pro Tour events.
